The users combine their chakra and create a [[Eight Trigrams Twin Lions Crumbling Attack|gigantic lion head]] where their hands meet, within it a [[Rasengan]], empowered by both users' chakra is formed. This technique is strong enough to completely destroy the [[Tenseigan (Energy Vessel)|Tenseigan]].

== Trivia ==
* While it was unnamed in the movie and novelisation, it was named in ''[[Naruto x Boruto: Ninja Voltage]]''.
* This technique resembles [[Gentle Phoenix Spiralling Twin Lion Fists]], a [[cooperation ninjutsu]] of Naruto and Hinata in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm Revolution]]''. Their [[Gentle Step Tailed Beast Twin Lion Fists]] cooperation ninjutsu from ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4]]'' resembles the mechanics of the technique as well.
